item.title: Twitter Updates for 2009-07-15
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• Made turkey gyros with homemade tzatziki sauce, mmm tasty! #
  • Today is the one year anniversary of us leaving Orlando to make the 2 day drive to Boston. Wow a year already. #
  • Off to my company's outing! #
  • Kimball Farm Pitch N Putt #
  • Kimball Farm Driving range #
  • Kimball farm driving range #
  • I'm at Kimball Farm (400 Littleton Rd, Westford). #

Powered by Twitter Tools.
